  • Method Details

    • register

      @NotNull public @NotNull com.telenav.kivakit.kernel.messaging.messages.Result<Service> register​(Service service)
      Registers a Service, returning a Service object that has been bound to a unique physical port (on a specific host) and which has a lease on that port for a few minutes. The resulting new registration information will be immediately passed on to the NetworkServiceRegistry.

      This method is only implemented by LocalServiceRegistry since the NetworkServiceRegistry is updated through information propagated from local registries.

      Parameters:
      service - The service to register
      Returns:
      The registered service, bound to a port

    • renew

      @NotNull public @NotNull com.telenav.kivakit.kernel.messaging.messages.Result<Service> renew​(Service service)
      Description copied from interface: ServiceRegistry
      Renews the lease on a service that has been registered with ServiceRegistry.register(Service) on the local host. The resulting renewal information will be passed on to the NetworkServiceRegistry.

      This method is only implemented by LocalServiceRegistry since the NetworkServiceRegistry is updated through information propagated from local registries.
